newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - UBS starts Lazare Kaplan.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - UBS starts Lazare Kaplan.

text.p: -- UBS Securities analyst Michael Dudas said he started Lazare Kaplan International Inc with a buy rating and set a 12- to 18-month target price of $27 to $30 per share.
-- In published comments, he estimated the company would see a five-year revenue growth rate of 18 percent and net earnings growth of 25 percent.
-- He said the stock is currently trading at 10.7 times his fiscal 1997 year earnings estimate of $1.60 per share and 9.5 times his fiscal 1998 estimate of $1.80 per share.
